definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tear, rend garment (NH = BH; Ar. farama chop up onions, etc. (Landberg:Pr 421); Syr. pram cut, rend);—always c. [[בְּגׇדִים]]:

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִפְרׂם]] Le 21:10 (H), 2 mpl. [[תִּפְרָׂמוּ]] Le 10:6 (P); Pt. pass. pl. [[פְּרֻמִים]] Le 13:45 (P).
